data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Haute-Kotto unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
Lord, make the 23,161 believers in Haute-Kotto to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 49,039 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 49,039 lost in Haute-Kotto that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the state of Haute-Kotto prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Haute-Kotto, Central African Republic to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 23,161 believers in Haute-Kotto, Central African Republic a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Haute-Kotto to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.
